title: JURA J10 Piano Black (15562), Automatic Coffee Machine, NEW!
description:
Brand new JURA J10 Piano Black (15562) Automatic Coffee Machine, sealed in original packaging. This premium bean-to-cup espresso machine features one-touch operation, automatic shut-off, removable water tank, energy-saving mode, bypass doser, hot water spout, display, integrated grinder, and removable drip tray.

Key Features:
- Condition: New, unopened, undamaged, in original packaging
- Brand: JURA
- Model: J10 Piano Black (15562)
- Product Type: Kaffeevollautomat (Bean-to-Cup Coffee Machine)
- Color: Black
- Voltage: 230 V (for use in USA/Canada, a voltage converter is required)
- Power: 1450 W
- Pressure: 15 bar
- Cable Length: 110 cm
- Control: Digital
- Coffee Type: Whole Bean
- Compatible Water Filters: Claris, Jura Claris Smart
- Included: Water tank
- Heat-up Time: 20-25 s
- EAN: 7610917155620
- Manufacturer Number: 15562
- Coffee Variations: Espresso Macchiato, Hot Milk, Filter Coffee, Espresso, Latte Macchiato, Cappuccino
- Special Features: One-button operation, automatic shut-off, removable water tank, energy-saving mode, bypass doser, hot water spout, display, integrated grinder, removable drip tray

Category: Home & Garden > Small Kitchen Appliances > Coffee, Tea & Espresso Makers > Bean-to-Cup Coffee Machines

Shipping & Export Info:
- Brand NEW in original packaging
- We ship via DHL, UPS, or DPD
- For export to non-European countries only
- Shipping to USA/Canada via UPS (8-12 business days)
- For use in USA (120V) you need a voltage converter (e.g., UMI 1600 Watt Step Up Voltage Converter 110V to 220V)

Enjoy barista-quality coffee at home with the JURA J10. Fast shipping and secure checkout at HappyDeel.
